# bonjour-bloom



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                             | Type     | Default |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `ratioNorth`     | `ratio-north`      | The fill property of the north petal of the flower      | `number` | `1`     |
| `ratioNorthEast` | `ratio-north-east` | The fill property of the north-east petal of the flower | `number` | `0.9`   |
| `ratioNorthWest` | `ratio-north-west` | The fill property of the north-west petal of the flower | `number` | `0.2`   |
| `ratioSouth`     | `ratio-south`      | The fill property of the south petal of the flower      | `number` | `0.5`   |
| `ratioSouthEast` | `ratio-south-east` | The fill property of the south-east petal of the flower | `number` | `0.7`   |
| `ratioSouthWest` | `ratio-south-west` | The fill property of the south-west petal of the flower | `number` | `0.3`   |


## Slots

| Slot           | Description                                                     |
| -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"north"`      | Commonly a text, displayed at north position of the flower      |
| `"north-east"` | Commonly a text, displayed at north-east position of the flower |
| `"north-west"` | Commonly a text, displayed at north-west position of the flower |
| `"south"`      | Commonly a text, displayed at south position of the flower      |
| `"south-east"` | Commonly a text, displayed at south-east position of the flower |
| `"south-west"` | Commonly a text, displayed at south-west position of the flower |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                  | Description                                                                             |
| ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--bloom-container-background`        | A background for the container.                                                         |
| `--bloom-container-height`            | Container height, default 100%.                                                         |
| `--bloom-container-max-height`        | Container max height.                                                                   |
| `--bloom-container-max-width`         | Container max width.                                                                    |
| `--bloom-container-width`             | Container width, default 100%.                                                          |
| `--bloom-petal-north-background`      | Background color of the north petal, default #FB9196                                    |
| `--bloom-petal-north-east-background` | Background color of the north petal, default #F97C22                                    |
| `--bloom-petal-north-west-background` | Background color of the north petal, default #2E7979                                    |
| `--bloom-petal-shadow`                | A box-shadow for each petals, default rgba(0, 0, 0, .16).                               |
| `--bloom-petal-south-background`      | Background color of the north petal, default #2CB250                                    |
| `--bloom-petal-south-east-background` | Background color of the north petal, default #FFD664                                    |
| `--bloom-petal-south-west-background` | Background color of the north petal, default #2AD4CF                                    |
| `--bloom-size`                        | The base size of the flower, default 100px. The heart and the petals inherit this size. |
